import React, { Fragment, useState } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; const CreateProfile = (props) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: "", website: "", locations: "", status: "", skills: "", githubusername: "", bio: "", twitter: "", facebook: "", linkedin: "", youtube: "", instagram: "", }); const [displaySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false) const { company, website, loation, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram, } = formData; return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or a company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialInputs && }
Go Back
); }; CreateProfile.propTypes = {}; export default CreateProfile;
